text: (yoosuph ko lekar misr pahunche aur vahaan use bade naphe mein bech daala) aur misr ke logon se (azeeje misr) jisane (unako khareeda tha apanee beevee (zulekha) se kahane laga isako ijzat va aabaru se rakho ajab nahin ye hamen kuchh napha pahunchae ya (shaayad) isako apana beta hee bana len aur yoo hamane yoosuph ko mulk (misr) mein (jagah dekar) qaabiz banaaya aur garaz ye thee ki hamane use khvaab kee baaton kee taabeer sikhaayee aur khuda to apane kaam par (har tarah ke) gaalib va qaadir hai magar bahutere log (usako) nahin jaanate
